Now let's look at clue 3 again: "the photographer is on the left or right of the thai". We've already established that the photographer is in column 1. If the Thai person were also in column 2, then this would contradict the statement. So the Thai person must be in column 1.

The only remaining columns are hobby and movie-genre. Cooking fits well with apple (column 1), so reading belongs to column 2. Spy movies fit well with the Thai person's culture (column 1), so drama movies belong to column 2.
